mapper.sql: select t.id, t.code, t.name, t.remark, t.is_enabled, t.is_systemic, t.is_deleted, t.created_by, t.created_time, t.last_modified_by, t.last_modified_time, t.deleted_by, t.deleted_time from sys_role t
mapper.insert: insert into sys_role(id, code, name, remark, created_by, created_time) values (#{id}, #{code}, #{name}, #{remark}, #{createdBy}, #{createdTime})

delete from sys_role_permission where role_id = #{id};
insert into sys_role_permission values
(#{id}, #{checkedId}, ${@cn.koala.persist.domain.YesNo@NO.value}),
